place_description: Independent bookstore selling new & used books

reviews_data.review_text: Wonderful atmosphere, great selection of books, and friendly service. Will definitely be back!

Best bookstore around (and we've visited a lot of bookstores)! Well curated selection, super-helpful staff, and the perfect ambience, all connected by a hallway to the coffeehouse next door. Great mix of new and gently used books. Love this place!
Gorgeous bookstore and great staff.  Definitely on the high-end of pricing, though.  Love how it connects to the neighboring coffee shop.
Our family's favorite bookstore! Beautifully curated selection of books, cozy atmosphere, and excellent employees. I would give it more stars if I could.
Great bookstore with a wonderful selection!
Love Goldberry!

Was in town for a business appointment in mid December and afterwards had time to stop by this book shop. Very nice atmosphere and good selection of topics and books for this size of store. Staff was helpful and pleasant. Purchased a good read for the holidays. Would recommend a visit and will be back by when next in Concord.
Nice spot, I love the kids area. My toddler loves playing with the puzzles. Quiet space to relax. Great selection of books
Such a cool, unique place. The selection was interesting and well-curated. Left with an armful of books and can't wait to go back!

My favorite bookstore in the greater Charlotte area (and there are a lot of good ones!). They have a fantastic selection of books plus awesome non-book gifts, and the store itself is beautiful -- plus it's connected to a cafe for maximum coziness. Their social media presence is also great, and I love the reading challenges they've done the past couple years. I just love everything about this place.
Best Bookstore around. I always have a great time and the staff are very nice!
Fantastic selection and service, Nancy helped me find the book I was looking for, and my kids love going to the kids section of the store.
This is a beautiful store in downtown Concord. A very friendly staff that's always willing to help. If they don't have the book in store they can order it for you!

I went during the week before Thanksgiving, was greeted by the owner and he let me stay a few moments after  closing time and I was grateful. Some homey feeling,  big smiles and great prices. I would be back! #SmallBusinessSaturdays
This is the best bookstore I've ever been to! The store itself is beautiful, books for all ages to enjoy, and helpful staff! This is a must see.

Goldberry Books is the epitome of a book store. When you close your eyes and think of "local book store", Goldberry fits that image. It's cozy, it smells good, and it's full to the brim with books. YEAH, BOOKS!! Void of any gaudy trinkets and toys, it's full of books. Oh there are some trinkets, but they are extremely bookish and cozy and cute. But the books! David curates his inventory to carry the best of the best. Orthodox religion, education, lifestyle, fiction and non-fiction, children's and young readers, and more. He has all the classics, and the best modern selections. The young readers section is full of wholesome material, so I can trust my kids can pick a good book. The children's section is filled with the most beautiful picture books, and there are toys and stuff, so my kids can play without ever seeming like a burden. OH! And there are used books scattered about, so you might get the exciting moment of grabbing a book off the shelf and seeing the used price tag. And there is David, the owner, who is the nicest guy. He's not just some guy behind the counter - you can tell he truly has a passion for books and art, which is evident by the number of podcasts he hosts. Anyways. This review was supposed to sound good because I want to convince everyone to go. Because is there is any place I want to become a Concord institution (along side Mullis Music), it's Goldberry Books. I hope in 30 years my kids go to buy books from David.
Such a beautiful shop! They had an excellent selection of books for both adults and children. It was well organized and had such a cozy, inviting atmosphere.
Wonderful bookstore in Downtown Concord, my wife and I love it
They do a great job of helping ensure the books on their shelves are actually good books.
Wonderful independent bookstore with an engaging and knowledgeable owner. New and used books and worth a visit.
Amazing selection and deals

Quaint, lovely place to spend an afternoon. Wonderful employees. Excellent preparation for young customers in the children's area.
Love the book selection. Came away with several treasures!
Best bookstore in North Carolina. Hands down. Great selection and if you don't see what you're looking for they order it for you.
Good bookstore.  Doesn't have the trash books that seem to be at every bookstore anymore.  I almost think that if a book is here it was semi vetted first which is fantastic.

I don't know how they do it, but when I walked into this store, I immediately felt calm and happy. It could be the ambiance: warm wood bookshelves, peaceful (but not sleepy) music, soft lighting.  Whatever it was, I didn't want to leave - and that was prior to realizing just how incredible the collection/selection of books was.  Although it seems they had a little of everything, including bestsellers, you won't find stacks of trendy-author, cookie cutter paperbacks. You WILL find thousands of interesting books you didn't even realize you wanted, hundreds of books you should buy for your family and friends, and even a great selection of unique cards and gifts for that cool, and perhaps a tad nerdy, person who will appreciate the effort.  Their children's book section was so thoughtfully and carefully curated, I  wanted to buy a shelf full for the grandkids I don't even have yet!
All of the great things to say about the store wouldn't be complete without mentioning the service: friendly, helpful, and not pushy or annoying.
It was hard to leave, and I'm already planning another trip!
A nice local book shop with a great selection. Well worth a trip out of the way to visit.
The staff knows what it's doing and the owner is nice the book selection prizes quality over quantity. The selection may not be as big as Books A Million but the products are incredible.

My wife and I went to "Goldberry Books" earlier and we enjoyed our visit. We especially liked the prices!

The best place to see in Concord!
Such a cozy little bookstore! Books are full cost, but it's nice to support local businesses. The atmosphere is so warm and inviting.
Great locally own book store. It's next to a coffee shop that's really good to go too. They have great classic children books here too.
An absolutely wonderful place that cultivates community through reading.

There is no comparison! Walk in and the smell is that amazing book smell that should make you feel like a good human. Browse for a new title or just ask David for ideas and be open to a new treat.

There is a kids' area and plenty of space to read and relax. I'm honored to spend my money here!
Cute, small, homey feeling - not a huge selections, but super friendly staff
Great selections, lovely and comfortable atmosphere. My husband and I love this book store!!!
Great bookstore. Helpful people with a wide selection of new and used books.
I love the selection of books, the sense of community and the way this shop develops culture in Concord!

Love this sweet bookstore - specially the children's section! And the biography section.

And the classics section

...and the literature section.

And the owners!
Love the atmosphere and the owner! Always a pleasure chatting with him! My kids love the children's area
We traveled from Greenville, SC and found Goldberry Books to be as delightful as we had hoped.  Thank you, David, for helping us locate books as well as a yummy place for lunch (Not Just Franks).

We absolutely love Goldberry! Our go to book store and a great way to spend the day ! The wonderful smell of coffee next door is perfect when browsing for your next read. So calming and peaceful with awesome selection and ambiance.

The essential bookstore. They don't have everything (its not barnes and noble) but every book is good. it's where you go to find favorites you haven't heard of yet. Great children's section. If David is there, ask for a suggestion--you can't go wrong.
Such a precious collection of unique books! We went for the first time today, and we were so impressed!
Awesome bookstore! Great owner. So kind and helpful. 10/10
A lovely spot for curated books, kind people, and a wonderful afternoon. JB
Great selection! Cute atmosphere. I love it!
Wonderful little store. So nice being able to shop and buy physical books without having to deal with the mall.

Beautifully curated selection- atmosphere is perfection. Attached to a coffee shop and great children's space. Staff struck that perfect balance of giving you space to browse and providing help/suggestions when needed. They know and love their books. I would live here if it were closer.

Quaint little shop right next to a delicious coffee shop. Stopped by and browsed the books Very clean and modern and comfortable. The shop keeper was super friendly and shared great suggestions on other shops to visit while I was in town. A great ambassador for the rest of the town!
Loved this adorable shop! I have a thing for children's books and was in heaven. Overall wonderful selection of books, sweet atmosphere, and the smell of coffee from nextdoor.

My family and I stumbled into this gem of a bookstore and how glad we did. New and used books are so well organized and presented throughout the store. Original and beautiful stickers, posters, mugs and artwork. The children corner is astonishing and a joy for littles. We will be back!!!

For those who loved the old bookstores with the old creaky wooden floors this is the place for you.  I like books on theology and you would be surprised at what you can find there. A true blessing to any book lover. Those who work there are very cordial and helpful.
Wonderful selection, warm vibe, great employees. Lovely place to drop in and spend an hour browsing. Even better to find your latest great read.

Such a chic place. The most positive vibes as you walk in. I fell a little in love. There was a very friendly young man eager to help people find the perfect books. We were at the big antique mall in Concord and decided to explore downtown. The next time you are in the area- this place is a must! Make an afternoon out of it and stay for dinner-
there are multiple restaurants in town. Have some fun exploring!

Great atmosphere, owners, and selection.  This place is a true gem in the incredible setting of Downtown Concord.  Grab a coffee next door at Press & Porter, grab a book you'd like to preview, and have a seat in one of their comfy couches. It doesn't get any better than Goldberry Books.
Great variety in a small shop. Staff is very friendly.

If you can read, do not miss Goldberry Books!!! David is super knowledgable and will help you pick out the perfect book! Even knows how to pronounce "Yoknapatawpha". He might even deliver your book. Fair prices and great selection. Great selection of children's books as well. Has all the latest bestsellers but also books you may not be aware of but will be glad he told you about. Also some used books and paperbacks if you are on a budget. Not to be missed for lovers of the written word!!!
Beautiful little book shop in old part of downtown Concord! Friendly staff that won't bother you unless you have a question.
Great selection of new and used books. Robust selection of Tolkien and related works (probably should have guessed based on the name). Will certainly be back!

What a gem.  Every great town needs a great book store. Goldberry fits the bill.  Beautiful on the inside with a great selection.  Family owner and operated, exactly what Concord needs. Kids section is legendary.

I love this shop! The selection of books are curated with great care, with something for everyone. I like visiting when I'm in town, but with their shipping services, I will never need to buy from Amazon for my books ever again, even though I don't live in Concord!
5/5

We stumbled upon Goldberry Books on one of our walks downtown. Our three year old daughter LOVES this place. Every time we come downtown Concord, if she sees the bookstore then we are going inside to get a book. The staff is great and very family-friendly. Definitely check this place out it is a gem located in our downtown.

Great bookstore, amazing owner. I'd purchase a special edition of Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen, curated by Barbara Heller. Beautiful written letters that complimented the novel. Now, I'm also getting the Harry Potter book set illustrated by Jim Kay.

David and the crew at Goldberry Books pulled some texture/feely books for my new baby nephew for pick-up. I live out of state, but wanted to support a local bookstore near my sister. Working with David and Goldberry was a dream. He was really thoughtful and spent a lot of time curating a great collection of baby books for me. I am so thankful for this experience and will be connecting with Goldberry in the future. Thanks, David and team!
An excellent bookshop!!!

I discovered this place through bookshop.org, and I'm really glad to see a good bookstore finally came to downtown Concord. Warm, cozy and inviting atmosphere. They have a great selection of Tolkien, and were able to place an order for me for something they didn't have in stock. Their in-store selection is somewhat meager at the moment, but I think it will grow as word-of-mouth spreads and they get donations from the community. Bottom line: really excited to see this place take off, and I look forward to visiting often!

My wife listens to a pod cast produced by the owners of this book store, so we had to visit the actual store since we were in town. A great find... many books...many topics. Staff was warm, welcoming and informative.
Great shop with a friendly owner who takes the time to help you get what you want

Great, relaxed atmosphere. The children's section creates a great opportunity for the littles to skim the books for themselves + play, while I go skim books for myself. Goldberry is a wonderful addition to the neighborhood!
What an amazing book store in historic downtown Concord! The owners are incredible and so very helpful and their childrens' books section is absolutely phenomenal.

A fantastic addition to Concord and right next to a coffee shop no less! The inside is aesthetically pleasing and smells incredible. The owner is extremely nice. We have been waiting for a great book store to open up in downtown and Goldberry does not disappoint.

The advantage to a shop like this, aside from the fact that you aren't exacerbating the Amazon problem, is that the owners are very knowledgeable about nearly every genre. This means they can offer a curated set of books alongside personalized recommendations, far better than anything you're going to get online. You can see and touch the books, skim through them, and really take your time in a quiet space to make your decision. It makes the whole experience more humane and brings back a sense of respect for the work that goes into writing, editing, designing, and publishing. Books are important, they can shape who we are and change our lives forever, they shouldn't be delivered in a cardboard box next to your subscribe-and-save toilet paper. Shop local, buy your books from real people who deserve your time, attention, and money.

Awesome bookstore. Met the owner, Dave I think is his name. Really knowledgable. Excellent curated collection, but he can order you a book if they don't have it in stock. Better than giving Jeff Bezos more money.

Love this bookstore!  Love that it's downtown. Owners are fantastic, great selection and will order books for you if they don't have it! I'm so happy I can support a small business rather than buying books on amazon!

Support local! Wonderful bookstore atmosphere with new trending books for ALL ages!! Best Children's section room with play area and amazing selection of picture books. This is the bookstore experience that Cabarrus County needs. Affordable pricing and customer service was fantastic! Conveniently located next to a coffee shop
nice selection..good cust ser

This is a lovely bookstore in downtown Concord that opened during the pandemic just before Christmas 2020. The owner is delightful and personable. They sell new and used books and I like how they are mixes together. The children's collection could be larger, but the children's space is nice. Adjacent to a coffee shop  can support local with one stone. Wonderful local shop.

Today was our first time in this little shop and love it so much. From the moment you walk in this store you are hit with the comforting  smell of books. They had a great selection and the people were friendly. We will definitely be back. We were even allowed to set down and read a little of our books before purchasing. And the classical music playing in the back ground gave this little local shop the perfect ambience.

We just moved to downtown Concord and stopped in at Goldberry Books. Ended up chatting with the owner David and learning that they have only been open a few months. Very charming store that feels like it's been there for ages. Their children's section is beautifully curated, I had to keep myself from buying too many books for our young daughter. The shop fits  the vibe of the area perfectly. Can't wait to return.
Found my new bookstore! Very happy that Goldberry is in Concord!
On a whim I decided to see if this bookstore had a book that my husband asked me for Christmas and sure enough they did! What a great addition to the downtown Concord area.
This is just what Downtown Concord needed!!! Love the decor, tons of fab books and the owners live nearby!!! Definitely worth visiting and may put Amazon out of business dang it!!
Cost place for good reads!

This place is awesome! It's exactly everything you want to find in a small business and small town bookstore.

Their children's section will ignite curiosity and joy in your kids as they sit on the comfy couches and chairs and sample their large selection of children's material, all while you search the shelves for an excellent book yourself!

If you need help with suggestions, the owners are also really helpful and make excellent suggestions!
The shop is bright and open with a wonderful selection. I found gifts for family, friends, and for myself!

Got to check out our new bookstore today for the first time. So glad to have them as part of our community! Great selection at reasonable prices. Wife and I each picked up a book for ourselves and one for our 2 month old son. Will definitely be back again!
